title: Internship Opportunities in Madrid
description:
The placement is for 6 months (less in exceptions circumstances) and is in Business Development (including Marketing) and Accommodation departments of the school, which is located in the heart of Madrid (near Retiro Park). 

The business development role includes tasks such as:
* Website Development
* Social Media Marketing
* Marketing Journalism
* Contacting agents and partner companies 
* General administration tasks

The accommodation officer role may include:
* Visiting possible accommodation to check standards
* Organising accommodation for AIL Madrid´s students
* Preparing contracts 
* Collecting and returning  deposits 

Both positions also may require translation so languages are a bonus. Candidates for the accommodation department will require confidence speaking Spanish by phone to host families, students etc. 

The internships are both full time and interns will receive a wage of 300€ per month and are also offered a free evening Spanish course. 

Any students interested should send their CV and covering letter to my colleague Ania at ania@ailmadrid.com
